doc.name: AnythingToDouble
doc.description:
This actor converts an input token to a double. If the input is a double, it acts as an identity. Otherwise, it outputs a double token equal to NaN. This is useful if you wish to force an output from a generic actor to always output doubles.

If you want to convert a string to a double, see the ptolemy.actor.lib.conversions.ExpressionToToken actor. or the ptolemy.actor.lib.conversions.StringToDouble actor.
doc.author: Adam Cataldo
